data.title: Gregory Benford; Larry Niven Book & Series List
data.meta_description: A complete list of all Gregory Benford; Larry Niven's books & series in order (3 books) (1 series). Browse plot descriptions, book covers, genres, pseudonyms, ratings and awards.

Bowl of Heaven

Oct-2012

/ Science Fiction

In this first collaboration by science fiction masters Larry Niven ("Ringworld") and Gregory Benford ("Timescape"), the limits of wonder are redrawn once again as a human expedition to another star system is jeopardized by an encounter with an astoni...

/ Science Fiction

Science fiction masters Larry Niven (Ringworld) and Gregory Benford (Timescape) continue the thrilling adventure of a human expedition to another star system that is jeopardized by an encounter with an astonishingly immense artifact in interstellar s...
